description.narrative: The purpose of this Project is to reduce the maternal mortality ratio by at least 35 percent and neonatal mortality similarly by at least 35 percent in targeted districts. the Safe Motherhood Project will improve health service delivery, which the Ministry of Health defines as care that is delivered in a competent, clean, and caring environment. It also implies that the services provided are accessible, effective, efficient, safe, acceptable, and equitable. It is envisioned that this comprehensive collaborative model of delivering high-impact interventions, using the comparative advantages of different implementing partners, will significantly contribute to the reduction of maternal and child mortality and serve as a model for scale-up to other districts country-wid
